headline.print_headline: Lopez Retains Eastbourne Title, Keys Wins Her 1st
headline.main: Lopez Retains Eastbourne Title, Keys Wins Her 1st

docs.snippet: Feliciano Lopez of Spain completed a successful title defense when he beat top seed Richard Gasquet of France 6-3, 6-7 (5), 7-5 in the Aegon International final on Saturday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Feliciano Lopez of Spain completed a successful title defense when he beat top seed Richard Gasquet of France 6-3, 6-7 (5), 7-5 in the Aegon International final on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Perky Australians Seek to Complete Spanish Misery
headline.main: Perky Australians Seek to Complete Spanish Misery

docs.snippet: Only pride is at stake when deposed champions Spain meet Australia in the World Cup on Monday but the Australians want  to inflict more pain on their demoralised rivals before they  head home....
docs.lead_paragraph: Only pride is at stake when deposed champions Spain meet Australia in the World Cup on Monday but the Australians want  to inflict more pain on their demoralised rivals before they  head home.

headline.print_headline: Egypt Jails Man for a Year as Push Against Sexual Harassment Begins
headline.main: Egypt Jails Man for a Year as Push Against Sexual Harassment Begins

docs.snippet: A Cairo court sentenced a man to one year in jail on Saturday for harassing a woman, the swiftest such ruling since Egypt introduced a new law in early June to combat sexual harassment....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Cairo court sentenced a man to one year in jail on Saturday for harassing a woman, the swiftest such ruling since Egypt introduced a new law in early June to combat sexual harassment.

headline.print_headline: South Korea Soldier Shoots Dead Five Comrades Near Border With North
headline.main: South Korea Soldier Shoots Dead Five Comrades Near Border With North

docs.snippet: A South Korean conscript soldier shot and killed five of his fellow unit members and injured five others late on Saturday at a guard post near the heavily armed border with North Korea, a South Korean official said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A South Korean conscript soldier shot and killed five of his fellow unit members and injured five others late on Saturday at a guard post near the heavily armed border with North Korea, a South Korean official said.

headline.print_headline: Search On for SKorea Soldier Who Killed 5 Comrades
headline.main: Search On for SKorea Soldier Who Killed 5 Comrades

docs.snippet: The military searched Sunday for an armed South Korean soldier who fled after killing five of his comrades and wounding seven at an outpost near the North Korean border....
docs.lead_paragraph: The military searched Sunday for an armed South Korean soldier who fled after killing five of his comrades and wounding seven at an outpost near the North Korean border.

headline.print_headline: Bomb Under Car Seat Kills Somali Journalist
headline.main: Bomb Under Car Seat Kills Somali Journalist

docs.snippet: A journalist in Somalia's capital says a bomb planted under the car seat of a Somali reporter exploded and killed him....
docs.lead_paragraph: A journalist in Somalia's capital says a bomb planted under the car seat of a Somali reporter exploded and killed him.

headline.main: Cyberattack on Hong Kong Vote Was Among Largest Ever, Security Chief Says

docs.snippet: The distributed denial-of-service attack commanded a network of compromised computers around the world in an apparent attempt to overwhelm polling on Hong Kong’s political future....
docs.abstract: The distributed denial-of-service attack commanded a network of compromised computers around the world in an apparent attempt to overwhelm polling on Hong Kong’s political future.

headline.print_headline: No Royal Kisses for Balotelli as Italy Draw a Blank
headline.main: No Royal Kisses for Balotelli as Italy Draw a Blank

docs.snippet: There will be no kisses from Queen Elizabeth for Italy striker Mario Balotelli after his team wilted in the Brazilian heat against Costa Rica and slumped to a 1-0 defeat....
docs.lead_paragraph: There will be no kisses from Queen Elizabeth for Italy striker Mario Balotelli after his team wilted in the Brazilian heat against Costa Rica and slumped to a 1-0 defeat.

headline.main: Argentina vs. Iran: World Cup 2014 Live Blog

docs.snippet: Argentina can wrap up its expected second round berth. An Iran win, or even a draw, would rank at the top of the list of its greatest soccer achievements....
docs.abstract: Argentina can wrap up its expected second round berth. An Iran win, or even a draw, would rank at the top of the list of its greatest soccer achievements.
